The Guardian reported overnight: Last week executives, including the editors of Rupert Murdoch 's four British papers, held a three-day meeting at Babington House in Somerset about the future of the company, aware that Rupert Murdoch is flying into London this week at a crucial time. "I'd be amazed if they didn't discuss Andy Coulson , said a source with some knowledge of the meeting. Ben Smith: Mike Pence 's mom says he'll announce plans tomorrow Indiana Rep. Mike Pence 's mother tells the National Journal that he'll announce a decision on his his political future tomorrow: Rep. Mike Pence , R-Ind., is set to announce a decision on his political future on Friday, according to his mother, who has been urging him to finally put an end to all of the building speculation over his political future.
